title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 606.100 - Amendment, abrogation or suspension
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 606.100 - Amendment, abrogation or suspension

State Regulations

The board reserves the right to alter, amend or abrogate
any or all of the rules and regulations in this Part, and may adopt new ones at
any time the board may deem expedient. In any case wherein the board deems it
just and proper, the operation or application of any rule or regulation herein
may be suspended. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
606.100

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
